sect2.title: Installation of GC
sect2.para: Install GC by running the following commands:
To test the results, issue: make check.

screen.userinput: make install && install -v -m644 doc/gc.man /usr/share/man/man3/gc_malloc.3 && ln -sfv gc_malloc.3 /usr/share/man/man3/gc.3

sect2.title: Command Explanations
sect2.para: sed -i 's#pkgdata#doc#' doc/doc.am, autoreconf and --docdir=/usr/share/doc/gc-&gc-version;: These commands allow us to install the documentation in a versioned directory.
--enable-cplusplus: This parameter enables the building and installing the C++ library along with the standard C library.
